metadata.title: CVE-2024-50065 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ntfs3: Change to non-blocking allocation in ntfs_d_hashd_hash is done while under "rcu-walk" and should not sleep.__get_name() allocates using GFP_KERNEL, having the possibilityto sleep when under memory pressure. Change the allocation toGFP_NOWAIT.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
